thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com
thread.title: SD

author: SD
title: SD
text: The Antarctica peninsula trip was fabulous and the ship's crew/staff deserve commendation for doing such a terrific job -- from start to finish highly professional, well informed, making sure everyone is part of the experience. None of the activities were left out, from kayaking to polar plunge and plenty of penguins, whale and seal watching, including the memorable zodiac cruise to the volcanic Spert island, among others. Although not a cruise fan, I loved this one as the number of days were just right and the amenities very many, including good food.
